DOC.brief_summary: The aim test whether rtfMRI-based neurofeedback training anterior insula impact pain empathy .
DOC.detailed_description: In present study , investigator plan use real-time fMRI neurofeedback train healthy subject learn volitional control anterior insula ( AI ) activity . Then effect AI regulation assess examine subject ' empathic response functional connectivity change . Subjects separate two group randomly . While experimental group receive specific neurofeedback AI , control group receive sham NF unspecific region .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject without past current psychiatric neurological disorder history head injury ; claustrophobia ; pregnancy ; medical psychiatric illness .
